meanings.definition: A type of spiny shrub with yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The gorses in the garden have bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a field full of gorses on my walk.
meanings.sent3: The gorses whispered secrets to the bees buzzing around.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like gorses - prickly on the outside but beautiful within.
meanings.sent5: The gorses stood proudly in the sunlight, a golden sea of spikes.

meanings.definition: To cover or fill with gorses.
meanings.sent1: We decided to gorses the area to keep it safe from intruders.
meanings.sent2: The landscape was gorsesed with the vibrant shrubs.
meanings.sent3: He gorsesed the room with so many plants, it felt like a jungle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to gorses the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush seemed to gorses the canvas with colors of the sunset.
